import React from 'react'; import PokedexList from './PokedexList.js'; class Pokedex extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state={ pokeOnpokedex: [] } } pokeInfo = (poke) => { this.setState({pokeOnpokedex: poke}) console.log(poke.types) } render(){ const p = this.state.pokeOnpokedex return( <>

{p.name}

    {this.props.pokemons.map(pokemon=> )}
) } } export default Pokedex;
